data.title: Bow Wow Wow I Want Candy - Pink Vinyl UK Vinyl LP
data.meta_description: BOW WOW WOW I Want Candy (2023 UK/EU limited edition 10-track LP pressed on 180-gram Pink Vinyl featuring the title smash hit single I Want Candy, plus Go Wild In The Country, Baby Oh No and Louis Quatorze.Picture sleeve individually silver-foil numbered and limited to just 1000 copies, plus insert & hype sticker) Tracklisting & Info: I Want Candy is a compilation album by Bow Wow Wow featuring their biggest hit "I Want Candy". The album consists of all four tracks from their EP The Last of the Mohicans, four tracks from their debut album See Jungle! See Jungle! Go Join Your Gang Yeah, City All Over! Go Ape Crazy!, and the track "El Boss Dicho", that comes from the B-side of the single "Go Wild in the Country". The song "I Want Candy" was the band's most successful one and became an enduring new wave classic. It was a smash hit in the US, Europe and Australia and featured on VH1's "100 Greatest Songs of the '80s" list. The track was produced by Kenny Laguna who is known for his work with Joan Jett. I Want Candy is available as a limited edition of 1000 individually numbered copies on pink coloured vinyl and includes an insert. SIDE A 1. I WANT CANDY 2. BABY, OH NO 3. LOUIS QUATORZE 4. COWBOY 5. MILE HIGH CLUB SIDE B 1. GO WILD IN THE COUNTRY 2. JUNGLE BOY 3. EL BOSS DICHO 4. (I'M A) T.V. SAVAGE 5. KING KONG Year of Release - 2023 Format - vinyl LP album (LP record) Record Label - Music On Vinyl Catalogue No - MOVLP2972 Country of Origin - United Kingdom Barcode - 8719262020870

BOW WOW WOW I Want Candy (2023 UK/EU limited edition 10-track LP pressed on 180-gram Pink Vinyl featuring the title smash hit single I Want Candy, plus Go Wild In The Country, Baby Oh No and Louis Quatorze.Picture sleeve individually silver-foil numbered and limited to just 1000 copies, plus insert & hype sticker)

TRACKLISTING AND EXTRA INFORMATION

I Want Candy is a compilation album by Bow Wow Wow featuring their biggest hit "I Want Candy". The album consists of all four tracks from their EP The Last of the Mohicans, four tracks from their debut album See Jungle! See Jungle! Go Join Your Gang Yeah, City All Over! Go Ape Crazy!, and the track "El Boss Dicho", that comes from the B-side of the single "Go Wild in the Country".

The song "I Want Candy" was the band's most successful one and became an enduring new wave classic. It was a smash hit in the US, Europe and Australia and featured on VH1's "100 Greatest Songs of the '80s" list. The track was produced by Kenny Laguna who is known for his work with Joan Jett.

I Want Candy is available as a limited edition of 1000 individually numbered copies on pink coloured vinyl and includes an insert.

SIDE A

1. I WANT CANDY

2. BABY, OH NO

3. LOUIS QUATORZE

4. COWBOY

5. MILE HIGH CLUB

SIDE B

1. GO WILD IN THE COUNTRY

2. JUNGLE BOY

3. EL BOSS DICHO

4. (I'M A) T.V. SAVAGE

5. KING KONG
